name: I Know You Did It
description:
When playing the game, press the full screen button in the bottom right corner for an optimal experience.

I Know You Did It is an FMV mystery game in which you view security tapes to find evidence against an individual. You have a limited amount of actions you can take before you're out of time, so work quickly. But watch out -- you're not safe just because you're behind a screen...It's Her Story meets Five Nights at Freddy's.

I Know You Did It was made using Twine 1.4.2 and TweeVee. You can find TweeVee here.
